original_text: Yet I am writing you a new command; its truth is seen in him and in you, because the darkness is passing and the true light is already shining.
korean_text: 다시 내가 너희에게 새 계명을 쓰노니 그에게와 너희에게도 참된 것이라 이는 어둠이 지나가고 참빛이 벌써 비침이니라

sentences.original_text: Yet I am writing you a new command
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나는 너희에게 새 계명을 쓰고 있으며

sentences.original_text: its truth is seen in him
and the true light is already shining
sentences.korean_translation: 참된 빛이 이미 비추고 있기 때문이라
